page.title: 14RECREATION IN LINTON
page.content: Most people think that the facilities in Linton are reasonable except for the younger generations.People's favourite activity that they do in their spare time is reading.This was so for 7 people out of the 11 interviewed.Gardening and Music came second.They were the favourites of 5 people.The average amount of television watched in a week is 10 hours.Half of the people we asked went to clubs which are different.Everyone reads a newspaper especially the free local ones.The article that most people look for is sport.On the whole people spend their spare time wisely. They do things like cooking,walking, sport,computing and many others too. Surprisingly T.V.was put down by very few people as their favourite. By:E.Roper,J.Dann,V.Smoothy,W.Ripsher, T.Anderson,M.Orchard.
